XIII.ii.2.D.1.b
.
When VA Notifies OPM
VA informs OPM of
apparent irregular or erroneous statements made in connection with claims for benefits, or
inconsistent statements, particularly with respect to age, date of birth, or physical condition.
Note
:  There are instances when, under present regulations, such information may not be disclosed, since it would be harmful to the Veteran’s physical or mental health (
38 U.S.C. 7332
).
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D - Information Sharing With the Office of Personnel Management (OPM)
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D
